com.fayf.net
Class AsyncSelector

java.lang.Object
  com.fayf.net.AsyncSelector
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class AsyncSelector
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

A wrapper around Java NIO classes. To get an instance, use getInstance(). Use the bind/connect methods to start listening/connecting to servers.

Author:
Andrew

public java.nio.channels.SocketChannel connectSocketChannel(java.net.InetSocketAddress address,
                                                            OnConnectedListener listener,
                                                            AsyncWorker worker)
                                                     throws java.io.IOException
Connects a SocketChannel.

Parameters:
address - The address to connect to.
listener - Callback when a socket connection is ready to be written to.
worker - The worker that processes data coming from this channel.
Returns:
The SocketChannel used for binding.

java.io.IOException

bindServerSocketChannel

public java.nio.channels.ServerSocketChannel bindServerSocketChannel(java.net.InetSocketAddress address,
                                                                     OnAcceptListener listener)
                                                              throws java.io.IOException
Binds a ServerSocketChannel to listen for connections.

Parameters:
address - The address to listen on.
listener - Callback when a socket connection is made. Attach a worker using registerWorker(java.nio.channels.SelectableChannel, com.fayf.net.AsyncWorker) in the callback.
Returns:
The ServerSocketChannel used for binding.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

registerWorker

public void registerWorker(java.nio.channels.SelectableChannel channel,
                           AsyncWorker worker)
Registers a worker to process data coming from a channel, and creates a thread to run it if it is not already running in one.

If there is an existing worker registered to the channel, it is terminated, and replaced by the new worker.

Parameters:
channel - The channel to listen for data on.
worker - The worker that processes the data.

unregisterWorker

public void unregisterWorker(java.nio.channels.SelectableChannel channel)
Unregisters a worker from a channel. The thread containing the worker is terminated. Does nothing if channel is null

Parameters:
channel -

disconnectChannel

public void disconnectChannel(java.nio.channels.SelectableChannel channel)
                       throws java.io.IOException
Disconnects a channel. Registered workers are NOT terminated.

Parameters:
channel -
Throws:
java.io.IOException

disconnectChannel

public void disconnectChannel(java.nio.channels.SelectionKey key)
                       throws java.io.IOException
Disconnects a channel. Registered workers are NOT terminated.

Parameters:
channel -
Throws:
java.io.IOException

shutdown

public void shutdown()
Shuts down the selector. All channels are closed and all workers are terminated.
